content.text:
[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) [@regular](@nti4TWBH/WNZnfwEoSleF3bgagd63Z5yeEnmFIyq0KA=.ed25519) 

I don't have internet right now so I cant click the link again, but one of those animals (weta, I think?) looks like a gigantic insect. They make my skin crawl a bit, but otherwise they seem super interesting. I'm going to add this to my list-o-todos, the island looks beautiful and I'd love to see some penguins.

As an aside, I can't stop thinking about the weta (I hope that's right) crawling all over at dusk like [@nanomonkey](@+D0ku/LReK6kqd3PSrcVCfbLYbDtTmS4Bd21rqhpYNA=.ed25519) described [tarantulas](%qK+BCaoXLc64KFZig0NdNJUZkHqobE3iLu40OsCywIg=.sha256) a few months ago.
